result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۖ وَمَن يُشَآقِّ ٱللَّهَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
result.translation: 4. Toh keenit kah tekkem diggah usun Yallaa kee kay farmoytih amri yckeelefeeniih, cincenimi, kaadu Yallih amri yekeelefeeh cine marah Yalli gibdi digaala Íe.
